google_reviews.author: Alberta Garcia
google_reviews.review: Ta was amazing! Our application process took less then 1 week and she was great at communicating. The units look great and the price was fair when compared to other rentals in the area.

google_reviews.author: Simon P
google_reviews.review: Excellent rental property. Manager is awesome and the apartments are well appointed. Very positive stay here.

google_reviews.author: Hayden Anderson
google_reviews.review: Amazing management and very well maintained property. Nice appliances and building materials were used. A little drafty at times but nothing a heater can't fix. Love this place!

google_reviews.author: Stephanie Rasmussen
google_reviews.review: Very friendly manager, beautiful and well-lit apartments, a fenced off-leash area for dogs, and  an indoor heated dog wash station! The two service requests I have had to put in were resolved within 24 hours, even with having to call out an electrician.

google_reviews.author: Julian McAllister
google_reviews.review: Good but it could be better

ownerResponse.text: Hi Julian. Thank you for your review. Please let me know what I can do to make living here at Cedar Grove better for you. As you know, my door is always open for you and Sharon.

summary.text:
Good

Cedar Grove Apartments receive favorable recognition for their quick and efficient application process. Prospective tenants have experienced ease and satisfaction with communication, highlighting a particularly swift application timeframe of less than a week. In addition, the property boasts aesthetic appeal, with the apartments deemed good-looking and furnished with commendable appliances that add to the tenants' comfort and convenience.

Management at Cedar Grove Apartments earns praise for its dedication and friendliness, contributing to a welcoming atmosphere within the community. They have shown proficiency in addressing and resolving service requests expediently, often within a 24-hour timeframe, which includes arranging for specialized services like electricians. This promptness in handling maintenance issues indicates a commitment to providing residents with a hassle-free living experience.

Great

The amenities offered at Cedar Grove Apartments set a high standard for tenant satisfaction with features that cater to both human and canine residents. Notably, the property includes a well-equipped, fenced off-leash area perfect for dog owners, alongside an indoor heated dog wash station, details that are not commonly found in comparable rental properties but are highly appreciated by the residents.

Bad

While reviews are generally positive, some residents believe that there is still room for improvement at Cedar Grove Apartments. A review suggested that despite the general satisfaction, certain aspects could be enhanced to elevate the living experience. However, the review lacked specific details on what the areas for enhancement could be, leaving a vague sentiment of discontent.

Ugly

Throughout the user reviews, there appears to be a singular minor concern regarding the temperature control within the apartments; they are noted to be somewhat drafty. Although this is a point of discomfort, it is also acknowledged that the issue can be remedied using a heater. Despite this, the general sentiment remains positive, with no severe or recurring complaints making the 'ugly' aspects of Cedar Grove Apartments seem relatively tame compared to more severe cases in property management.
